meanings.sent1: The vermoulu fruit was covered in mold.
meanings.sent2: The old book had a vermoulu smell.
meanings.sent3: The vermoulu cheese made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house had a vermoulu appearance.
meanings.sent5: The vermoulu wood crumbled at the touch.

meanings.sent1: Leaves vermoulu quickly in damp conditions.
meanings.sent2: If you leave food out, it will vermoulu.
meanings.sent3: The forgotten sandwich decided to vermoulu overnight.
meanings.sent4: Neglect can cause things to vermoulu faster.
meanings.sent5: Time will vermoulu all things eventually.

meanings.definition: a state of decay or rotting
meanings.sent1: The vermoulu of the old building was evident.
meanings.sent2: The forest was filled with the vermoulu of fallen trees.
meanings.sent3: The vermoulu of the fruit bowl was a sad sight.
meanings.sent4: The city's neglect led to a visible vermoulu.
meanings.sent5: The smell of vermoulu filled the air in the abandoned house.
